title: Code Together
description: An application that allows multiple users to connect and code a modular program simultaneously. It also has the capability of compiling and executing Java code using JRE.

title: Database Tester
description: An App that allows the user to access and modify the data stored within their local database without using any SQL command.

title: Amazing Labyrinth
description: A multiplayer game following the rules of Amazing Labyrinth, AI is incorporated and can be selected as opponents.
